nodes.text: Galladinium's Galactic Datalog of Fantastic Technology

Galladinium's Galactic Datalog of Fantastic Technology, often referred to simply as Galladinium's Datalog, was a datalog purveying fine merchandise to an upscale clientele. Its 50th anniversary issue was released during the Galactic Civil War.

As many items in the datalog could be used for combat purposes, it was banned by Moff Shinda of Spirva Sector. As a result, a lucrative smuggling opportunity colloquially known as the "Spirva Run" developed to deliver items from Galladinium's Datalog into the sector.
The roleplaying book Galladinium's Fantastic Technology maintains the in-universe conceit that it is the 50th anniversary issue of Galladinium's Datalog.
